description: I'm a retired software developer who likes to build things with his hands. Woodworking is a creative, playful outlet for me.
skills: Willing to try, and fail, at new tasks
Finishes that allow the wood to express
detailOrQuote: One of the more rewarding aspects of woodworking is the variety. Whether it's kumiko, small boxes, cutting dovetails, furniture, even outdoor construction, they all emanate from a human instinct, a partnership with the wood.
